Title: Going Down and Out in Beverly Hills
Plot: Hank tries to get the truth about Ashby; Karen confronts the record producer; Marcy detoxes at her mother's house; Charlie succumbs to temptation.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Drug use,sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Madchen Amick, Vincent Angell, Paola Turbay, Michaela Watkins
